news_header: A stabbing in Villach, Austria, resulted in the death of a 14-year-old boy and injuries to five others, identified as an Islamist attack linked to the Islamic State.
news_original_title: Austria attack that killed teen linked to IS, officials say
news_text: A 23-year-old Syrian asylum seeker was arrested and charged with murder. The suspect had a valid residence permit and no prior criminal record. The incident has sparked discussions about asylum laws in Austria, with calls for legal reforms and screenings of specific groups.
